Description: Fragment of papyrus with 8 lines of Coptic text written against the fibres on one ('recto') side, 4 lines written at a 90 degree angle, also against the fibres, on the other side. EA75355, 75354, 75353, 75352, 75351, 75350, 75349, 75348, 75347, 75346, 75345, 75344, 75343, 75342 are mounted together.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380757) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380757)
